Affix.Name: Marechaussee Hunter
Affix.Desc: When current HP increases or decreases, CRIT Rate will be increased by 12% for 5s. Max 3 stacks.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Forgotten Vessel
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A portable metal vessel containing strong wine. Can be stuffed into the pocket of an outer coat for ease of access and use.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Masterpiece's Overture
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A portable tool used to adjust the torque on some old-school clockwork machine. It has since lost its practical value.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Veteran's Visage
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: An old mask that can, to some extent, stand in for a face marred by wounds. Its design can vary based on the wounded areas and the user's gender.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Hunter's Brooch
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: An ancient emblem that was once awarded to those who had made exceptional contributions in battle.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Moment of Judgment
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A standard pocket watch. Its accuracy is not particularly high.
